name: TwitterCards
description: With Twitter Cards, you can attach rich photos, videos and media experience to Tweets that drive traffic to your website. Simply add a few lines of HTML to your webpage, and users who Tweet links to your content will have a “Card” added to the Tweet that’s visible to all of their followers.
title: TwitterCards

___twitter:app:id:iphone.description: Your app ID in the iTunes App Store (Note: NOT your bundle ID)
___twitter:app:id:iphone.title: twitter:app:id:iphone

___twitter:data2.description: Bottom customizable data field, can be a relatively short string (ie “Seattle, WA”)
___twitter:data2.title: twitter:data2

___twitter:data1.description: Top customizable data field, can be a relatively short string (ie “$3.99”)
___twitter:data1.title: twitter:data1

___twitter:image2.description: 1st, 2nd, 3rd, and 4th image in the gallery, respectively. Images must be less than 1MB in size
___twitter:image2.title: twitter:image2

___twitter:image1.description: 1st, 2nd, 3rd, and 4th image in the gallery, respectively. Images must be less than 1MB in size
___twitter:image1.title: twitter:image1

___twitter:image3.description: 1st, 2nd, 3rd, and 4th image in the gallery, respectively. Images must be less than 1MB in size
___twitter:image3.title: twitter:image3

___twitter:image0.description: 1st, 2nd, 3rd, and 4th image in the gallery, respectively. Images must be less than 1MB in size
___twitter:image0.title: twitter:image0

___twitter:player:stream.description: URL to raw video or audio stream
___twitter:player:stream.title: twitter:player:stream

___twitter:site:id.description: Same as twitter:site, but the user’s Twitter ID
___twitter:site:id.title: twitter:site:id

___twitter:label1.description: Customizable label or units for the information in twitter:data1 (best practice: use all caps)
___twitter:label1.title: twitter:label1

___twitter:image:src.description: URL of image to use in the card. Image must be less than 1MB in size
___twitter:image:src.title: twitter:image:src

___twitter:label2.description: Customizable label or units for the information in twitter:data1 (best practice: use all caps)
___twitter:label2.title: twitter:label2

___twitter:app:name:ipad.description: Name of your iPad optimized app
___twitter:app:name:ipad.title: twitter:app:name:ipad

___twitter:app:url:iphone.description: Your app’s custom URL scheme (you must include “://” after your scheme name)
___twitter:app:url:iphone.title: twitter:app:url:iphone

___twitter:app:id:googleplay.description: Your app ID in the Google Play Store
___twitter:app:id:googleplay.title: twitter:app:id:googleplay

___twitter:app:id:ipad.description: Your app ID in the iTunes App Store
___twitter:app:id:ipad.title: twitter:app:id:ipad

___twitter:creator:id.description: Twitter user ID of content creator
___twitter:creator:id.title: twitter:creator:id
